short_summary: SUPPORT TO THE DIRECTORATE OF AEROSPACE EQUIPMENT BUSINESS MANAGEMENT (DAEBM) 2
description:
The Department of National Defence requires the services of one (1) Intermediate Life Cycle Management Specialist to provide support to the Directorate of Aerospace Equipment Business Management (DAEBM) 2.

The estimated level of effort of the contract will be for 240 days per resource per year.
The estimated time frame of contract - 1 March 2023 to 28 February 2025 plus three (3) irrevocable option years.

Gisin: • Technical Engineering and Maintenance Services (TEMS) (Excludes requirements related to armament, R&D and R&O)

Security Requirements: 
	* Security Requirements Check List:
	**\ Common PS SRCL #20
		* Supplier Security Clearance required:
		**\ FSC - Secret
